XmlUI:
<!-- Xml UI. See documentation: https://api.tabletopsimulator.com/ui/introUI/ -->
<Defaults>
   <Button color="#282828" textColor="#F0F0F0" fontSize="16"/>
   <Text color="#F0F0F0"/>
   <InputField color="#282828" textColor="#F0F0F0" fontSize="12"/>
   <Image preserveAspect="true"/>
</Defaults>

<Button id="show-drawer" onClick="toggleDrawer"
  width="85" height="75" offsetXY="200 -2"
  rectAlignment="UpperLeft"
  tooltip="Masters of the Heist controls">
  <Image image="drawer logo" width="100%"></Image>
</Button>

<Panel id="drawer"
  width="200" height="600"
  active="false"
  rectAlignment="UpperLeft"
  offsetXY="200 -75"
  childForceExpandWidth="false"
  showAnimation="Grow"
  hideAnimation="Shrink"
  animationDuration="0.25">
  <VerticalLayout padding="0 5 5 5" spacing="5">
    <Button id="clean-up" onClick="cleanUp"
      width="200">
      <Text>Clean Up</Text>
    </Button>
    <Button id="the-docks" onClick="theDocks"
      width="200">
      <Text>The Docks</Text>
    </Button>
    <InputField id="custom-savestring"
      onEndEdit="setCustomSaveString"
      font_size="10"
      height="500"
      placeholder="Paste savestring from Scenario Designer"
      lineType="MultiLineSubmit"
      offset="210 0"></InputField>
  </VerticalLayout>
</Panel>
LuaScript:
notecard_guid = 'bb25d9'
security_chit     = getObjectFromGUID('899118')
tile_hex_guids = {
  '481787',
  '708524',
  '6b98d0',
  'ea375d',
  '5f574e',
  '1ae41d',
  '2cd212',
  '87ce25',
  '4548c0',
  '99ef65',
  'd821b5',
  'a7a307',
  '191bf1',
  '7fa0fe',
  'c893ff',
  'addcc4',
  'a2b3d6',
  'ee93dd',
  '08ff18',
  'a60f2e',
  '752b2e',
  '1011e9',
  'e41e0f',
  '8a98be',
  'c07b3c',
  'd95034',
  'e2419a',
  'f9ca00',
  'e972b0',
  'ed60ee',
  'a4d467',
  '46ddb4',
}

function isHex(tile)
  return tile ~= "GP"
     and tile ~= "E1"
     and tile ~= "E2"
     and tile ~= "E3"
     and tile ~= "E4"
     and tile ~= "E5"
     and tile ~= "E6"
end

function onLoad()
  cleanUp()
  buildGameButtons()
  -- Wait.condition(function, function, float, function)
end

function toggleDrawer()
  if(UI.getAttributes('drawer').active == "true") then
    UI.hide('drawer')
  else
    UI.show('drawer')
  end
end

function cleanUp()
  for i, guid in pairs(tile_hex_guids) do
    tile = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
    tile.setPositionSmooth({
      x = -40,
      y = i*0.5,
      z = 20,
    }, false, false)
    tile.setRotation({x=0,y=90,z=0})
  end
end

function setUp(save_string)
  -- the_docks = "The+Docks|130|5|GP GP EM GD GP GP GP GP GP JW SC GP SC SC SC EM E5 GP GP SC SC SC GP GP GP GP GP GB GP CM RE SC SC EM E5 GP GP JW SC SC EM GP GP GP GP $2 GP GP SC GA GP GP GP GP GP $1 JW GC GP SC SC EM E5 GP GP GP $1 SC GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP"
  -- the_docks = "The+Crown+Jewels|30|5|GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP $2 $1 GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP SC GC SC SC GP GP GP GP $1 JW C2 SC GA EM E5 GP GP GP EM GD SC GB SC SC GP GP GP GP JW SC SC GP RE EM E5 GP GP GP GP EM GP SC SC SC GP GP GP GP GP JW SC GP SC $1 GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP EM GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP E1 GP GP GP GP GP"
  title = save_string:gsub("|.*$",''):gsub("+"," ")
  tile_list = ''; for w in save_string:gmatch("([^|]+)") do tile_list = w end

  hextiles = {}; t_i = 1
  for t in tile_list:gmatch("[^ ]+") do
    hextiles[t_i] = t
    t_i = t_i + 1
  end

  tile_guid_i = 1
  x_start = -14
  z_start = 11
  hex_width = 3.8
  z_shift = 3.3
  stride = math.sqrt(t_i - 1)
  odd_row_shift = 1.9
  for i,t in pairs(hextiles) do
    row = math.floor((i - 1) / stride)
    col = (i - 1) % stride
    if(isHex(t)) then
      tile = getObjectFromGUID(tile_hex_guids[tile_guid_i])
      tile.rotate({x=0,y=0,z=0})
      if(t ~= "SC") then -- normalize rotation and flip accordingly
        tile.setRotation({x=0,y=90,z=180})
      else
        tile.setRotation({x=0,y=90,z=0})
      end
      tile.setPositionSmooth({
        x = x_start + col * hex_width + (row % 2)* odd_row_shift,
        y = 10,
        z = z_start - row * z_shift,
      }, false, false)
      tile_guid_i = tile_guid_i + 1
    end
  end
end

function setSaveString(_obj, _color, save_string, stillEditing)
  if not stillEditing then
    setUp(save_string)
  end
end

-- From the drawer, not the notecard
function setCustomSaveString(_player, value, _id)
  setUp(value)
  UI.hide('drawer')
end

function theDocks()
  the_docks = "The+Docks|130|5|GP GP EM GD GP GP GP GP GP JW SC GP SC SC SC EM E5 GP GP SC SC SC GP GP GP GP GP GB GP CM RE SC SC EM E5 GP GP JW SC SC EM GP GP GP GP $2 GP GP SC GA GP GP GP GP GP $1 JW GC GP SC SC EM E5 GP GP GP $1 SC GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP GP"
  setUp(the_docks)
end

function buildGameButtons()
  getObjectFromGUID(notecard_guid).createButton({
    click_function = 'cleanUp',
    label = 'Clean Up',
    width = 600,
    height = 200,
    position = {
      x = 0,
      y = 10,
      z = -0.75,
    },
    rotation = {
      x = 0,
      y = 180,
      z = 0,
    }
  })
  getObjectFromGUID(notecard_guid).createButton({
    click_function = 'theDocks',
    label = 'The Docks',
    width = 500,
    height = 200,
    position = {
      x = 0,
      y = 10,
      z = -1.25,
    },
    rotation = {
      x = 0,
      y = 180,
      z = 0,
    }
  })
  getObjectFromGUID(notecard_guid).createInput({
    input_function = 'setSaveString',
    label = 'Set savestring',
    width = 500,
    height = 200,
    font_size = 25,
    position = {
      x = 0,
      y = 10,
      z = -2.00,
    },
    rotation = {
      x = 0,
      y = 180,
      z = 0,
    }
  })
end
